title: Create Portfolio Request
description: Request parameters for creating a portfolio workspace on a creative agent. The portfolio holds source assets and brand context; creatives are built separately via build_creatives.

brand_manifest_url.description: URL to the live brand manifest

assets.description: Source assets available for building creatives

asset_id.description: Identifier for this asset within the portfolio

asset_type.description: Type of asset (image, video, text, etc.)

trackers.description: Tracker URL templates with macro placeholders. Creative agent embeds these in built creatives; seller expands macros at serve time.

push_notification_config.description: Webhook configuration for notifications when portfolio state changes
